original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, posts as p WHERE pl.PostId = p.Id AND c.PostId = p.Id AND v.PostId = p.Id AND ph.PostId = p.Id AND c.Score=0 AND pl.CreationDate>=CAST('2011-03-22 06:18:34' AS TIMESTAMP) AND pl.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-22 20:04:25' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1.PostId=E3.PostId)

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE CAST(postLinks.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2011-03-22 06:18:34' AND CAST(postLinks.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-22 20:04:25'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E3.PostId=E2.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E3E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E3E2.PostId=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2E4E5 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E3E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E3E2E4.PostId=E5.Id)
